CustomField.description:
Rollup of the frequent role found on related Retool User records for self service orgs - Synced every 24 hours - Subscription Type != 'Committed' - Excludes churned committed customers: Account Status (Committed) != 'Former Customer' - Excludes Retool Users that haven't `logged in` in the last 90 days
External Systems Utilization: Polytomic
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Rollup of the frequent role found on related Retool User records for self service orgs (Subscription Type != 'Committed') - Excludes churned committed customers (Account Status (Committed) != 'Former Customer') - Excludes Retool Users that haven't `logged in` in the last 90 days
CustomField.label: Max Role At SS Org
